verses.text: Ix yalanxi vinhaj Job chi' icha tic:
¿B'aq'uinh val ol eyactej e tzuntzan ovaj in yaelal tic, tzeyak'an cus in k'ol yed' juntzanh e lolonel tic?
Ayexnhejoch eyalan chucal lolonel d'ayin. ¿Tom max ex q'uixvi eyalan d'ayin?
Q'uinaloc yel ay in mul chi', ¿tom tzeyab' syail yuuj?
Tzeyik' val chaanh e b'a d'ayin yuj in yaelal tic, tzeyalanoch d'a in sat to chuc in.
Palta comonoc snachajel eyuuj to a Dios icha tic tzin utani. A' ix in ak'anem d'a yol jun yaal tic.
Scomon el vav, svalan icha tic: Svab' val in chami, xin chi. Palta malaj mach stak'vi d'ayin. Tzin nib'ej ay mach tzin colani, palta malaj mach sb'oan yaj d'ayin.
A Dios ix macan yol in b'e, yic maxtzac yal in b'eyeq'ui. Ichato d'a scal q'uik'alq'uinal tzin ek' yuuj.
Ix yiq'uek' in b'eyumal, ix yik'anek' snivanil velk'ochi.
Ix in satem d'a junelnhej. A tas ayoch yipoc in k'ool, pilan ix lajviel icha junoc te te' malaj sch'anhal yib'.
Ix seccot yoval sk'ool d'a vib'anh, icha val junoc yajk'ool ix in yutej.
Masanil eb' soldado Dios chi' ix och oyan d'ayin. Ix oymaj eb' d'a spatictac in pat yic syak'an oval eb' ved'oc.
A Dios chi' ix ik'anel eb' vuk'tac yed' eb' vamigo d'a in tz'ey, ichaxonhej junoc comon anima ix in yutejcan eb'.
A eb' ayto vuj in b'a yed'oc yed' eb' vamigo, ix in yactejcan eb', ix in b'atcan satk'olal yuj eb'.
Axo eb' cajan d'a in pat yed' masanil eb' in checab', icha junoc ch'oc animail ix in ajcan d'a eb', maxtzac in yilochlaj eb'.
Tato svavtejcot junoc eb' in checab' chi', maxtzac tak'vilaj eb' d'ayin, vach'chom tzin tevi d'a eb'.
Ayic tzin k'och d'a stz'ey ix vetb'eyum, chuclaj sjab' xob'al in ti' syab' ix, axo eb' ayto vuj in b'a yed'oc, tzin syajel eb'.
Icha pax chi' eb' unin tzin spatiquejel eb'. Ayic syilan eb' veq'ui sb'uchvaj eb' d'ayin.
A val eb' ek'b'al te vach' vak'an yed'oc, tzin spatiquejel eb'. A val eb' tzin te tzalaj yed'oc, ix meltzajoch eb' ajk'olal d'ayin.
Toxo ix tacjioch in tz'umal yed' in b'ak'chil d'a in b'aquil, tevelxonhej pitzan in.
Ex vamigo, ok'ocab' e k'ool d'ayin, yujto a Dios ix ak'ancot jun yaelal tic d'a vib'anh.
¿Tas yuj tzak'anexnhej vuuj, icha tzin yutej Dios? ¿Tom manh k'ocb'ilocxo in eyak'an cusoc?
Ayoc val mach stz'ib'ancan juntzanh in lolonel tic. Comonoc tz'ak'chajcanoch d'a q'uen q'ueen.
Comonoc a yed' q'uen cincel nab'a hierro tz'ak'jicanoch d'a q'uen q'ueen yic scan d'a junelnhej.
Vojtac to a in Columal pitzannhej, axo d'a slajvub' k'ual ol emul d'a sat lum tic yic tzin scolani.
Vach'chom slajviel in tz'umal tic, palta ol vil val och Dios yed' in nivanil tic.
A in val lak'an ol vil val och yed' in sat, manh ch'ococ mach ol ilanoc. Vanxo slajvik'och vip svab'i.
Ayic svab'an eyalan icha tic: ¿Tas val scutej cak'an cus sk'ol vinh, yujto munil a vinh tz'ik'ancot syaelal chi' d'a yib'anh? xe chi.
Palta xivanhec d'a q'uen espada, aton yoval sk'ol Dios syak'lab'ej d'a eb' sk'ulan chucal. Ojtaquejequeli to ay jun Dios tzonh ch'olb'itani, xchi vinhaj Job chi'.
